input.js

This file contains some input helpers, such as key code constants.  It also exposes a pressedKeys variable.

Summary
input.jsThis file contains some input helpers, such as key code constants.
Constants
Keycodes
Variables
pressedKeysA dictionary of key codes that are currently being pressed down.
Functions
handleKeyDownA key handler that updates pressedKeys.
handleKeyUpA key handler that updates pressedKeys.

Variables

pressedKeys

var pressedKeys

A dictionary of key codes that are currently being pressed down.

Functions

handleKeyDown

function handleKeyDown(event)

A key handler that updates pressedKeys.  Bound automatically to document.onkeydown event.

handleKeyUp

function handleKeyUp(event)

A key handler that updates pressedKeys.  Bound automatically to document.onkeyup event.
